mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member(name, email, passwd, phone, birth, zipcode, addr) VALUES (#{name}, #{email}, #{passwd}, #{phone}, #{birth}, #{zipcode}, #{addr})
mapper.select: select name from member where email = #{email}
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET passwd = #{passwd}, phone = #{phone}, zipcode = #{zipcode}, addr = #{addr} WHERE email = #{email};
